overview: Haily and Veronica are horny as hell in their lingerie outfits. They make eyes at each other as they feel up their own breasts and pussies… • Do you have a girlfriend who's got a female friend that's just really close? Have you ever wondered if they're just buddies? That's just the situation that Raul finds himself in with his girlfriend Veronica and her friend Tiffany… • Amira is so sick of fighting with her boyfriend. When she finds herself alone after her boyfriend storms out, she calls her friend Alyssa to come over. Alyssa is there in a jiffy to comfort Amira… • It's romantic bath time for Cindy and Tiny. The girls start out at either end of the tub, but they eventually meet in the middle to have a champagne toast…
title: Girls Getaway
